description: Ms. codex. Title from fol. 1a by a later hand. Physical description: 18 lines per page; written in neat naskh in black on tan glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Extensive damp staining, but text still highly legible; first and last few leaves ragged. Fol. 185 is partially torn away. Incomplete at end. Incipit: نحمدك اللهم ىا من خلقنا و لم نك شىئا مذکوراً
author: Māzandarānī, Muḥammad Ṣāliḥ ibn Aḥmad, d. 1675 or 6.
abstract: Commentary on Ibn al-Shahīd al-Thānī's treatise on Islamic law, Maʻālim al-dīn wa-malādhdh al-mujtahidīn; missing leaves at end.
extent: 185 leaves : paper ; 215 x 122 (148 x 65) mm. bound to 213 x 127 mm.
title: [Kitāb Sharḥ Maʻālim].
provenance: On fol. 1a, owner's note by Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Nūrī dated 1222 H [1807 or 8]. Owner's seal on fol. 1b.
creator: مازندراني، محمد صاله بن احمد، d. 1675 or 6.
subject: Ibn al-Shahīd al-Thānī, al-Ḥasan, 1551 or 1552-1602 or 1603—Maʻālim al-dīn wa-malādhdh al-mujtahidīn.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
